snippet: People arrived at Narciso Rodriguez's show still debating how much influence John Galliano had in Oscar de la Renta's collection, and marveling at the draped suits and capes. But Mr. Rodriguez had no difficulty changing the subject.
abstract: People arrived at Narciso Rodriguez's show still debating how much influence John Galliano had in Oscar de la Renta's collection, and marveling at the draped suits and capes. But Mr. Rodriguez had no difficulty changing the subject.
